title: Jio Financial forms JV with BlackRock Advisors Singapore; to invest Rs 3 crore towards initial share subscription
description: Jio Financial Services and BlackRock Advisors Singapore have formed a joint venture named Jio BlackRock Investment Advisers Private Limited. Jio Financial will invest Rs. 3 crore in the venture. The company has received approval to increase foreign investment to 49%. This move aims to expand its fintech operations in India.
